content: the elephant c2c blanket is a free crochet pattern on my blog this adorable corner to corner crochet blanket would make the perfect baby blanket this cute little elephant is lifting up his trunk to play with a pretty butterfly - i just love how sweet and playful this image is perfect for a unisex gift for new babies or as an adorable addition to a baby s nursery decor - especially fitting for a safari wildlife themed nursery what a great baby shower gift this cute crochet baby blanket would make links to all the stitch and photo tutorials you need to get started with this fun colorwork technique made with the mini half_double_crochet c2c crochet technique for an approximate finished size of 36 x 36 square could be made larger with the standard double_crochet c2c technique
